main_tasks:
* Design and implement key components of the video streaming player.
* Develop code for our player SDK, extending and optimizing its   
   capabilities with new technologies.
* Integrate third party's modules into NexPlayer SDK.
* Development will be made in cooperation with other engineers at
   NexPlayer as well as with our customers. Customer orientation is key.
* Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills.
* Follow best practices to ensure the highest quality in our lifecycle 
   deliveries.

Hiring Process :
1st Interview (Korean)
2nd Interview (English)
requirements:
* B.D. or Master’s Degree in Telecommunications, Computer or Software 
   Engineering
* 2+ years of experience in a similar position
* Experience with C/C++ and Java. 
* Knowledge or Experience with Android native framework
jd:
NexPlayer는 크로스 플랫폼 비디오/오디오 스트리밍 제품을 만드는 서울팀에 합류할 재능 있는 소프트웨어 개발자를 찾고 있습니다. 
실무 개발자면서 프로젝트 설계 및 계획에도 참여하며, 고성능 스트리밍 인프라 개발, 비디오 스트리밍 백엔드 및 미디어 플레이어의 다양한 영역에서 기능 설계 및 개발을 하며, media technology 관련 해서 low level 부터 high level 까지 다양하게 경험 할 수 있습니다.
매우 국제적인 팀의 일원이 될 것이며, 가장 진보되고 최신 유행하는 기술을 다루고, 최고의 OTT 소프트웨어 회사와 파트너 관계를 맺을 기회를 갖게 될 것입니다.


주요업무
* Design and implement key components of the video streaming player.
* Develop code for our player SDK, extending and optimizing its   
   capabilities with new technologies.
* Integrate third party's modules into NexPlayer SDK.
* Development will be made in cooperation with other engineers at
   NexPlayer as well as with our customers. Customer orientation is key.
* Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills.
* Follow best practices to ensure the highest quality in our lifecycle 
   deliveries.

Hiring Process :
1st Interview (Korean)
2nd Interview (English)

자격요건
* B.D. or Master’s Degree in Telecommunications, Computer or Software 
   Engineering
* 2+ years of experience in a similar position
* Experience with C/C++ and Java. 
* Knowledge or Experience with Android native framework

우대사항
* Experience with video technologies, media services and content 
   protection.
* Knowledge of streaming protocols (DASH/HLS) and a various container 
   format. 
* Knowledge of multimedia technologies -  (video/audio) codecs, Widevine 
   & DRM.
* Knowledge of Android MediaCodec Framework and Audio architecture.

혜택 및 복지
설/추석 상여금
경조사비 및 휴가
도서구입비
체력단련비
자녀학자금
연1회 건강검진
장기근속 휴가 및 휴가비
간식 및 음료
